text: Lake Point Tower is a high-rise residential building located on the shore of Lake Michigan in downtown Chicago, just north of the Chicago River at 505 North Lake Shore Drive. It is in the Streeterville neighborhood of the Near North Side community area. The building is also the only skyscraper in downtown Chicago east of Lake Shore Drive. It is 645 ft (197 m) tall. ==References== ==Other websites== * Lake Point Tower website * Emporis listing Category:Skyscrapers in Chicago Category:1968 establishments in the United States Category:1960s establishments in Illinois
title: Lake Point Tower
